mapper.select: select d.facilityCode, d.idDate, d.currentTime, d.endTime from date d inner join user u on d.id = u.id where u.id= #{id}
select count(*) from date where idDate = #{idDate} and currentTime >= #{currentTime} and endTime <= #{endTime} and facilityCode = #{facilityCode}
select u.name, d.idDate, d.currentTime, d.endTime, d.facilityCode, d.approval, u.grade from user u inner join date d on u.id = d.id where d.approval = 1;
select s.facilityCode, d.idDate, d.currentTime, d.endTime from dateinsert s inner join date d on s.facilityCode = d.facilityCode where s.facilityCode = #{facilityCode} and d.idDate = #{idDate}
mapper.insert: insert into date(idDate, currentTime, endTime, facilityCode, id, approval) values(#{idDate}, #{currentTime}, #{endTime}, #{facilityCode}, #{id}, 1 )
